Speed of work in the railway and the road sector is progressing at a very quick pace: PM @narendramodi

The Dardanelles Victory has shown to the whole world what it can accomplish when it comes to homeland, religion, liberty and future.
Today, as it was yesterday, Çanakkale is a land that should never be forgotten for our country and for those who plan on our future.
Just as it was in Canakkale 102 years ago, on July 15th the most modern weapons were desperate in the face of determination and perseverance of our nationality.
I believe that those who lived on July 15 show us all how vigorous the spirit that grazed Seven centuries ago in Çanakkale.
I believe in the future that we will have unity and solidarity, with the same determination, to our country, to our independence and to our future.
We celebrate the 102th anniversary of the victory of the Dardanelles victory, and all our martyrs and vassals entrusting us with this sacred homeland ... https://t.co/lplTvjeBna

"Nationalism is not just an impasse but a danger, it adds rejection to discord" - @ fhollande
"Nationalism is war". The formula of F. Mitterrand was worth for tomorrow "- @ fhollande
"The choice you will make in the coming weeks is important for Europe" - @ fhollande
"We are all equal, French and French, with the same values ​​and the same ideals, nothing will come to divide us" - @ fhollande
"There is no future for us and our neighbors without Europe The exit of the Euro would be an exit from history" - @ fhollande
"The exit of the euro, it would also be a lowering of France" - @ fhollande
"Europe is the world's leading economic power, let's make it useful for the world" - @ fhollande
"France has an asset that needs to be remembered: it is strong in its institutions that allow the region to act as soon as it is necessary" - @ fhollande
"I defend institutions and I want to advance democracy, nothing will be done without civic engagement" - @ fhollande
"There are many ways to get involved, it is not necessary to be close to the Republic, to be elected, to be a citizen is enough" - @ fhollande
"You have to vote: make your choice in conscience, to say what we can do together" - @ fhollande
"France supposes that we believe in its destiny, it is loved and admired by the world, let us be aware of all that we have in common"
